attributes.comment:
My husband and I are in the process of adopting internationally. We ask that you
do not increase your fees. The cost of adoption is already very high. We have
already paid $140.00 for fingerprints and $545.00 for our I600. We have been
approved and we believe that that should be it. The thought of having to reapply
because of the slow down of our child match really worries me.

I wish you could help us adopting families out by extending how long the I171 is
valid for. And please do not increase your fees.

Thank you for you consideration.

Curt and Tammi Barber
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Curt and Tammi Barber
